gtl::Segment2

gtl::Segment2< Type > Class Template Reference

Represents a 2D line segment as a special case of a curve that is declared from 2 2D points. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename Type>
class gtl::Segment2< Type >

Represents a 2D line segment as a special case of a curve that is declared from 2 2D points.
